sentences.en: Dangerous effluent from some chemical plants is being poured into the river through the town.
sentences.cn: 几家化学工厂排出的有害废水正流入通过我们市镇的河里.

sentences.en: Each pollutant on the list is subject to effluent limitations based on the BAT standard.
sentences.cn: 清单上的每种污染物必须按照“最佳现有技术”标准服从污水排放限制.

sentences.en: Effluent from the sedimentation tank is dosed with disinfectant to kill any harmful organisms.
sentences.cn: 沉降池中的废水中加入了消毒剂，以消灭所有有害微生物。

sentences.en: Effluent standards have superseded stream standards.
sentences.cn: 排放标准已代替了流淌标准.

sentences.en: Industrial effluent often causes a problem to people's health.
sentences.cn: 工业废水常常危害人们的健康.

sentences.en: Section 301 ( b ) ( 2 ) prescribes BAT effluent limitations for " nonconventional " and toxic pollutants.
sentences.cn: 第201条 ( b ) ( 2 ) 中,针对 “ 非常规 ” 和有毒污染物规定了“最佳现有技术”污水限制.

sentences.en: So far, technology - based effluent limitations continue to govern discharges by industrial point sources.
sentences.cn: 至今, 以技术为基础的污水限制继续统管着工业污染源的排放.

sentences.en: The chemical companies are poisoning our rivers with effluent.
sentences.cn: 这些化学公司排出废水污染着我们的河流.

sentences.en: The effluent from the factory makes the river unsafe for swimming.
sentences.cn: 工厂放出的废水把这条河弄得不能游泳了.

sentences.en: The effluent from the factory was dumped into the river.
sentences.cn: 那家工厂的废水被排入河中。

sentences.en: The resulting effluent is then diluted upon combination with the total plant effluent.
sentences.cn: 所得的排出水与全厂排水汇合而被稀释.

sentences.en: The trickling filter and activated sludge efficiencies cited required primary sedimentation and effluent circulation.
sentences.cn: 列举的生物滤池与活性淤泥法的效率就需要初次沉淀和回流.

sentences.en: The waste after mercerization produces an effluent containing 5 % NaOH.
sentences.cn: 丝光后产生含碱量5%的废液.

sentences.en: There is only, at best , random monitoring of wastewater effluent by the pollution control agency.
sentences.cn: 污染控制机关充其量只是偶尔检查工厂的排水情况.

sentences.en: Those can remove organics and remove inorganics from the effluent.
sentences.cn: 这些可以从废水中去除有机物的一类和去除无机物的另一类.

phrases.tran_cn: 废气；烟道气，排出的气体

trans.tran_cn: （注入河里等的）污水，工业废水，（从湖等）流出的水流
trans.tran_en: liquid waste, especially chemicals or sewage
